professional_summary: Over 5 years of experience as an Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in database installation/configuration, production support, upgrades, patch management, performance tuning, backup/recovery, space management, security, and Data Guard. Proficient in standalone and RAC databases across various platforms, proactive monitoring using AWR, ADDM, and OEM Grid Control, and proficient in Flash-Back Recovery, ASM, and ADGM.

key_responsibilities: and maintained multiple Oracle 11g and RAC 12c databases on the Linux platform.
Configured and managed Oracle 11gR2 and 12c RAC across various environments.
Monitored and resolved performance bottlenecks using AWR and ADDM tools.
Utilized Data Pump utilities (impdp/expdp) for data migration and replication.
Analyzed and documented business requirements for IT projects.
Collaborated with development teams to ensure alignment between requirements and solutions.
Conducted data migration and system integration activities.
Provided end-user support and training for new systems.
